title: Creative Strategist for a Dropshipping Brand (Health & Beauty)
job_overview:
???? HIRING: Creative Strategist for Dropshipping Brand (PH-based)
We're looking for a Creative Strategist to help us build high-converting ad creatives for a health and beauty dropshipping brand. If you have experience with Facebook ads and understand the kind of content that converts in the dropshipping world, this could be for you.

???? What you’ll do
Come up with ad ideas, angles, and hooks
Work closely with our creative team to bring creatives to life
Focus on multiple products in the health/beauty niche

???? Requirements
Experience in dropshipping + Facebook ads
Strong creative sense and understanding of what performs
Portfolio of past ad creatives or campaigns
Available for freelance work and ready to start soon

???? How to Apply
Use the subject line: Creative Strategist – Your Name
We’ll contact shortlisted candidates for a quick interview. The final interview will be with the client.
